metadata.synopsis: The player spots a sign of Thulla's escape: footprints. Player wishes to take a closer look.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Go to -609.31, 22.93, 459.47, and succed on the check to spot the tracks.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Curious - what are those marks there?

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I see tracks there - or footprints. That's worth a look.
